comment._content: seems to have been involved with charity work, and testified in 1906 to the NY state assembly that one in five children in NYC died before the age of 2, in testimony regarding tuberculosis, attributed the the unsanitary air conditions in living spaces.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homer_Folks Homer C. Folks (February 18, 1867 - February 14, 1963) was a United States sociologist who worked as a social welfare advocate. He was the New York City Commissioner of Public Charities.

comment._content: Homer has one hell of a handle-bar broom, in addition to the thick makeup he has on for the photo.
